DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study was to evaluate the effect of chloroquine in the treatment of patients with dengue.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Chloroquine in the Treatment of Patients With Dengue
DOC.criteria: Patients suspected of having dengue disease Patients were included in the study if they presented with fever and at least two other symptoms, such as: headache pain behind the eyes muscle and bone or joint pains nausea vomiting rash associated to dengue for less than 72 hours Pregnant Younger than 18years old Either cardiac or neurologic disease
